hero_subtitle: Welcome to my personal corner on the internet. I invite you to get to know me and check out my projects/work.
project_subtitle:
Most of these projects were created during my high school or university studies. Below are only previews.
For more information on each project, click the button:
ASCII_dscrp: ASCII ART GENERATOR - a program that generates various ASCII shapes (rectangles, frames, diagonals) using the symbol 'x' based on three input numbers.
ANSI_dscrp: ANSI ESCAPE SEQUENCES - the program defines functions to draw dashed lines, stairs, flowers, and meadows (including animations), all with variable size.
GREP_dscrp: GREP PARSER - the program parses arguments, searches text in an input file with optional case-insensitivity, and prints the found lines.
ZELV_dscrp: DYNAMIC TURTLE - the program controls turtles (max. 3) on a dynamically allocated 2D canvas, which move, rotate, and draw/erase pixels 'o' with toroidal wrapping.
